desc: Gardener's Orchard & Bakery is a You-Pick farm, bakery, and cider mill located in Brighton. We specialize in growing specialty fruit: Apples, Peaches, Blackberries, Blueberries, Strawberries and Tomatoes. Seasonal produce also available. Made from scratch bakery is open providing bread, pastries, cakes, and coffee.

layout.text: We are open for Blackberry Season!

U-pick Price -$4.50 lb
Farm Access Fee- $5 Per Person, Kids Under 2 -Free
Senior discount 65+ $3
